reviewText:
Sai Paranjpe at her best. They made a joke on themselves by recreating this movie with new Bollywood actors. They can't match up with the talent of Sai Paranajpe and the rest of the team with Faruq Sheik, Deepti Naval, Ravi Vasawani, and Rakesh Bedi.
I have watched this movie over past 20+ years uncountable number of times, and still cannot feel tired of it.
The print was horrible, and a classic ruined. This was a total waste of money. Will keep trying to find a better print

This is a Sai Parajpaye classic. Hilarious and very simple. Kali Ghodi Dwaar Khadi, and other songs are superb. How I miss Indian cinema ( yes I call it Indian cinema, to distinguish it from Bollywood) of the 70's!
